entry.title: Hexo Next文章中加上音乐播放器
entry.content: 首先需要了解一下Aplayer下载地址：GitHub Aplayer。下载到本地以后，解压后把dist文件夹复制到themes/next/source文件夹下。 music.js新建一个js，路径为themes/next/source/dist/images/music.js;内容为： const ap = new APlayer({ container: document.getElementById('aplayer'), fixed: true, autoplay: false, audio: [ { name: "往后余生", artist: "王贰浪", url: "http://music.163.com/#/m/song?id=571338279", cover: "", } ] 如果还需要其他的参数，请参考：Aplayer中文文档 修改配置 打开themes/next/layout/_layout.swig文件，添加代码 添加到<body></body>里面就行了。 重新打包生生成,左下角就会有音乐播放器了。

entry.title: Vue+Element后台管理系统基本配置
Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
